name: .SCGC File Extension
summary: Learn about .SCGC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file created by myPM SCG Classic, a program that integrates with Excel to generate histograms, S curves, and project statistics of the Excel data; contains one or more SCG definitions that can be modified.

content: A SCG definition is the configuration data used by the myPM SCG Classic program to process the .XLS or .XLSX data source file, populate the template file, and generate the output file. Configuration information includes project details, S curve files, S curve options, data source map, and data source filter. You can view the SCG Definition configuration data through the various tabs located on the main form.
NOTE: myPM SCG Classic requires an installation of Microsoft Excel.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
